title: Aegis/Locket's build path is off
body: It builds out of Negatron Cloak that gives 40 MR but Aegis and Locket end up giving you only 20. Is this intended? I thought items were supposed to give you the same or increased stats when you build off of them.

replies.body: Aegis provides a +20 MR aura that also affects yourself. This with the base stats equates to 40 MR.

Don't you think a better way of writing this would be to show the stats the individual is getting, and then the aura over that? I think that's way more intuitive than the current method because of the very confusion by evinced this OP guy. Not to mention the fact that it adds a little bit more addition to a fairly straightforward stat machine.
